title: Game Crash
body: The first game after my everyday first win crashes... Today, every game crash after I got my first win... Is it because of my PC problem?

replies.body: Now it's 10 mins before each game...

The same happened to me. 

Don't worry. Riot are aware if this problem, and are trying to fix it.
the problem is... the punishment still applies... so I have waited in queue for 5 extra minutes for 4 games... (T_T)
just watch a 5 min youtube vid and your good

Official status announcement: "We are aware of players experiencing crashes during game start. Please visit the service status page for a workaround while we are working on a permanent fix."

Is that the same problem as yours? If so, I guess we could only wait it out.

It seems like the same problem.. I just hope at least they could cancel the punishment system before they work it out... I really don't want to wait for 5 minutes before each game if it's not my fault....
